revised_title: Explosives Research: Density and Pressure Effects
tldr: The author, Sir Andrew Noble, conducted experiments on various explosives to understand the effects of density and pressure on their transformation. He analyzed the composition of gases produced by firing explosives at different densities and pressures, and found significant differences between the explosives. The study also revealed the relationship between density and pressure developed by the explosion, which is essential for understanding the performance of explosives in real-world applications.
